items.sentence: Tom made a mistake in choosing Mary for the job.
Why do people always make things so complicated?
We have to make sure that doesn\'t happen again.
Tell Tom he\'s going to have to work late today.
Tell Tom that I\'m not interested in doing that.
Tom found a job not too far from where he lives.
Tom found something interesting in his backyard.
Tom gained a lot of weight after he got married.
Tom didn\'t like the way Mary cooked vegetables.
Tom didn\'t need to tell Mary. She already knew.
